stupidmodel.agents
Class TestBug

java.lang.Object
  stupidmodel.agents.TestBug

public class TestBug
extends java.lang.Object

Simple tests for the created Bug agents.

Since:
2.0-beta, 2011
Version:

 void testCompareToInvalidFirstParameter()
          Test illegal argument for Bug.BugSizeComparator.
 void testCompareToInvalidSecondParameter()
          Test illegal argument for Bug.BugSizeComparator.
 void testComparisonWithThreeElements()
          Making sure if the default comparison works correctly for three agents, and sorting returns an agent list in descending size order.
 void testComparisonWithTwoElements()
          Making sure if the default comparison works correctly for two agents, and sorting returns an agent list in descending size order.
 void testDying()
          Test if the bug dies it is removed from the context.
 void testFoodConsumptionWhenCellHasLesserFood()
          Test if food consumption of a Bug is capped at the food availability of the current cell.
 void testFoodConsumptionWhenCellHasMoreFood()
          Test if food consumption of a Bug is capped at the food consumption level of the current agent (which is 1.0 by default).
 void testGetUnderlying()
          Test the default behaviour of Bug.getUnderlyingCell().
 void testGetUnderlyingCellWhenMultipleCellGiven()
          Test Bug.getUnderlyingCell() when there is multiple associated underlying cells.
 void testGetUnderlyingCellWhenNoCellGiven()
          Test Bug.getUnderlyingCell() when there is no associated underlying cell.
 void testGrow()
          Test if Bug.grow() increases the size as required.
 void testInvalidParameterForSetInitialSize()
          Test invalid argument for the Bug.setInitialSize(cern.jet.random.Normal) function.
 void testInvalidParameterForSetSize()
          Test invalid argument for the Bug.setSize(double) function.
 void testMortalityReproduction()
          Test if the Bug.mortality() action results in reproduction when the bug reaches a size of 10.0.
 void testMortalityWhenBugAlwaysSurvives()
          Test if the Bug has 100% survival probability, it always survives.
 void testMortalityWhenBugDoesNotSurvives()
          Test if the Bug has 0% survival probability, it never survives.
 void testReproduceWithEmptyCellsInRange()
          Test reproduction by checking the number of freshly spawned Bug agents.
 void testReproduceWithNoEmptyCellsInRange()
          Test reproduction by checking there is no new Bug agents if there is no place to put them.
 void testSettingAboveOneSurvivalProbability()
          Test if setting an unexpected (greater than one) value for survival probability.
 void testSettingMaxCosnumptionRate()
          Test if setting a value for maximum consumption rate works as expected.
 void testSettingNegativeSurvivalProbability()
          Test if setting an unexpected (negative) value for survival probability.
 void testSettingSurvivalProbability()
          Test if setting a value for survival probability works as expected.
 void testSettingWrongMaxCosnumptionRate()
          Test if setting an unexpected value for maximum consumption rate.
 void testToStringWithGrid()
          Just to suppress toString() coverage noise.
 void testToStringWithoutGrid()
          Just to suppress toString() coverage noise.
